/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, their red and white facades standing out against the blue sky. These buildings are adorned with ornate roofs and red lanterns, adding to the cultural richness of the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, providing a sense of order and symmetry. Cars and pedestrians can be seen on the street, adding a touch of modern life to the historic setting. The image captures the blend of tradition and modernity that characterizes Beijing.
